tool.name: Overlay Cell Tracks

param.name: input_image_path
param.label: Optional: Enter path to images to be annotated.
param.help: Leave blank to get from AlignedImages folder in the Galaxy output folder, or enter path to images to be annotated, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/AlignedImages

param.name: mask_path
param.label: Optional: Enter path to Cell Masks.
param.help: Leave blank to get from CellMasks folder in the Galaxy output folder, or enter path to Cell Masks, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/CellMasks

param.name: output_results_path
param.label: Optional: Enter path to save Overlays.
param.help: Leave blank to save to OverlaysTablesResults folder in the Galaxy output folder, or another output path, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/OverlaysTablesResults

tool.help: For each time point, overlays cell annotation onto the image.
